Scripts.OnLoad:
BadKittyNewVersionTitle:SetText("BadKitty Version 1.11!") BadKittyNewVersionText:SetText("Here are the changes for this version:
------
Updated for the 3.3.3 Mangle 'buff'.

Trinket, idol, and enchant procs can now be shown in Cat Form! Presently,
it should correctly detect all melee trinkets and idols of ilevel 200 
or above, as well as Mongoose and Berserking on your weapon. The procs are
 tied to their respective items via a database. If you feel an 
item is missing, check out BadKittyProcList.lua (there are instructions), 
or tell me to add it, and I will.

The Warnings no longer show a '0' when a buff or debuff has fallen off. 

You can also adjust the color and font size of the warning text in the options menu.

The layout of the warnings can now be controlled through a less clunky 
interface (similar to what you're probably used to in action bar mods).

As always, if there are any bugs or problems, 
or if there's something you think is missing, please let me know. Happy shredding!")

FontString.name: $parentBKWModDesc
FontString.text: |c00FF0000Out of Range, |c00FFFF00Not Behind Target, |c00C0C0C0Target Dead, |c000000FFTarget Non-Hostile

Scripts.OnValueChanged: BadKittySaves[19] = this:GetValue() --BadKittyOptionsWarningFontDisplay:SetText(BadKittySaves[19]) if BadKittyThisIsStupid==1 then BadKitty_Setup() end

Scripts.OnClick: BadKittyColorTempFrame = this:GetName() ColorPickerFrame.cancelFunc = nil ColorPickerFrame.func = nil ColorPickerFrame.cancelFunc = BadKitty_CancelTextColor ColorPickerFrame:SetColorRGB(unpack(BadKittyTextColor)) ColorPickerFrame.func = BadKitty_SetTextColor ColorPickerFrame.previousValues = BadKittyTextColor ColorPickerFrame:Show()

BadKittyColorTempFrame = this:GetName() ColorPickerFrame.cancelFunc = nil ColorPickerFrame.func = nil ColorPickerFrame.cancelFunc = BadKitty_CancelWarningTextColor ColorPickerFrame:SetColorRGB(unpack(BadKittyWarningTextColor)) ColorPickerFrame.func = BadKitty_SetWarningTextColor ColorPickerFrame.previousValues = BadKittyWarningTextColor ColorPickerFrame:Show()

Scripts.OnLoad: BadKitty_OptionsLoad(self,"Bar Color and Texture") BadKittyColorOptionsTextureText:SetText("Select a bar texture! Example")

Scripts.OnClick: BadKittyColorTempFrame = this:GetName() ColorPickerFrame.cancelFunc = nil ColorPickerFrame.func = nil ColorPickerFrame.cancelFunc = BadKitty_CancelColor ColorPickerFrame:SetColorRGB(unpack(BadKittyCatSRColors)) ColorPickerFrame.func = BadKitty_SetColor ColorPickerFrame.previousValues = BadKittyCatSRColors ColorPickerFrame:Show()

Scripts.OnLoad:
BadKitty_OptionsLoad(self,"Bar Layout") BadKittyBarOptionsDescription:SetText("Use the arrows to move each bar up and down in order.
This will be the order they appear in their frames. Use the radio
 buttons on the right to limit the number of bars shown. 
No bars below the radio button will be visible.")

BadKitty_OptionsLoad(self,"Warning Layout") BadKittyWarnOptionsDescription:SetText("Use the arrows to move each spell up and down in order.
This will be the order they appear in their frames. Use the radio
 buttons on the right to limit the number of spells shown. 
No spells below the radio button will be visible.") --BadKittyWarnOptionsDescription2:SetText("")
Scripts.OnShow: this:SetBackdropColor(0.9,0.9,0.9,0.9) BadKitty_WarnOptionsText() BadKitty_BearWarnOptionsText() BadKitty_WCatRadioOff() BadKitty_WBearRadioOff() BadKitty_WOCatRadioOff() BadKitty_WOBearRadioOff() getglobal("BadKittyWarnOptionsCatRadio"..BadKittyWCatCount):SetChecked(1) getglobal("BadKittyWarnOptionsBearRadio"..BadKittyWBearCount):SetChecked(1) BadKittyWarnOptionsCatColumns:SetChecked(0) BadKittyWarnOptionsCatRows:SetChecked(0) BadKittyWarnOptionsBearColumns:SetChecked(0) BadKittyWarnOptionsCatRows:SetChecked(0) if BadKittySaves[14][2]=="c" then BadKittyWarnOptionsCatColumns:SetChecked(1) else BadKittyWarnOptionsCatRows:SetChecked(1) end if BadKittySaves[15][2]=="c" then BadKittyWarnOptionsBearColumns:SetChecked(1) else BadKittyWarnOptionsBearRows:SetChecked(1) end
